title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2812.2 - Region condition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2812.2 - Region condition

State Regulations
(a) Relevant, current and verifiable data, including but not limited to the most
recent census data pertaining to such region must demonstrate that the region
has sustained physical deterioration, decay, neglect or
disinvestment. (b) The region must
contain a significant number of deteriorating or substandard buildings not
being adequately repaired, renovated, upgraded, modernized or rehabilitated
under the existing programs to provide sound housing and retail and service
establishments which are affordable to the residents and local business persons
of such region. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2812.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
